  • tf 1.8 (cpu)
  • python 3.5
  • ubuntu 16.04

body:
@oahziur I have the same issue
tried your solution `cell.zero_state(batch_size=batch_size, dtype=tf.float32).clone(cell_state=initial_state)`

got:
AttributeError: 'tuple' object has no attribute 'clone'

---
* tf 1.8 (cpu)
* python 3.5
* ubuntu 16.04
